text: taruvata punarut'thana dinamuna ayana varini avamanaparustadu mariyu varini adugutadu: "Miru naku sati kalpincina varu - evarini gurinci ayite miru (visvasulato) vaduladevaro - ippudu ekkadunnaru?" Jnanam prasadincabadina varu antaru: "Niscayanga, i roju avamanam mariyu durdasa satyatiraskarula korake
